messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Teppo - looking for information. Greetings
messages.msgSnippet: look for THE JAPANESE MATCHLOCK (a story of the tanegashima) by Sugawa Shigeo An excellent two volume work in Japanese and English good hunting - Tom
messages.messageBody:
look for

THE JAPANESE MATCHLOCK (a story of the tanegashima) by Sugawa Shigeo

An excellent two volume work in Japanese and English

good hunting - Tom

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Teppo - looking for information. Greetings
messages.msgSnippet: Try Arms and Armour of the Samurai by Ian Bottomley and Anthony Hopson. Also, check out The Samurai Sourcebook by Stephen Turnbull. Both have excellently
messages.messageBody:
Try "Arms and Armour of the Samurai" by Ian Bottomley
and Anthony Hopson. Also, check out The Samurai
Sourcebook by Stephen Turnbull. Both have excellently
detailed information--"Arms" mainly about the weapons,
and Turnbull about the development and how they were
used.

Regards,

Nate

> about the

>

>
> Thank you in advance
>

messages.subject: Teppo - looking for information. Greetings
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I am looking for information and images or drawings about the japanese Teppo. Therefore, I am very happy to meet you. Thank you in advance

Hi,
I am looking for information and images or drawings about the
japanese Teppo.

Therefore, I am very happy to meet you.

Thank you in advance
